column4: you guys think VMWare would be able to support FL Studio? I NEED to make music but I don't wanna have to log onto windows every time :(
there's rosegarden for linux.. you might want to try that.
I looked into it, it doesn't seem like it does what i need it to
yeah, there's shortage of good sequencers for linux.. ardour looks it's gonna be beautiful once everything is implemented.
